io.oasp.gastronomy.restaurant.salesmanagement.logic.api.usecase

Interface UcChangeTable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Salesmanagement
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SalesmanagementImpl, UcChangeTableImpl

    public interface UcChangeTable
    Interface of use case to change the table. Interface of UcChangeTable to centralize documentation and signatures of methods.
    Author:
    mvielsac

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void changeTable(long orderId, long newTableId)
      UseCase to change from one table to another.

    • Method Detail

      • changeTable

        void changeTable(long orderId,
               long newTableId)
        UseCase to change from one table to another. The people sitting at a table are identified by their order that has to be provided as argument.
        Parameters:
        orderId - the order
        newTableId - the new table to switch to.
